verbs.description: [V: plagued] [ARG0: by a man - eating tiger india] has an odd idea vets with tranquilizer darts drones and even a powerful breed of hunting dogs have n't been able to track down and take out a dangerous tiger in india suspected of killing 13 so now forest rangers near pandharkawada are turning to a bottle of something they hope will make the tigress pandharkawada tigers militia calvin klein tigers india supreme court supreme court of the united states cubs new york times japan
